metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7438 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: The C software implementation of ECC in wolfSSL (formerly CyaSSL) before 3.9.10 makes it easier for local users to discover RSA keys by leveraging cache-bank hit differences.

advisory.DiscoveredBy: Gorka Irazoqui Apecechea and Xiaofei Guo

criterions.comment: wolfssl package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.9.10+dfsg-1').
